mapper.select: select a.company_no , a.company_name , a.owner_name , isnull(a.company_div, '') company_div , isnull(a.nation, '') nation , isnull(a.telephone, '') telephone , (select isnull(sum(license_count), 0) from license where company_no = a.company_no and start_date >= convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 20) and end_date <= convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 20)) as total_licenses , (select count(1) from member where company_no = a.company_no and use_status = 'Y') as total_users , 0 as total_satellite_usage from company as a where a.company_name like #{companyName} + '%';

select company_no , company_name , owner_name , business_no , resident_no , business_place , telephone , regist_datetime , regist_company , regist_user , modify_datetime , modify_company , modify_user from company where company_no = #{companyNo};
